last_episode_to_air.name: Life, Itself
last_episode_to_air.overview: Trapped inside a mysterious alien portal that defies familiar rules of time, space, and gravity, Captain Burnham must fight Moll – and the environment itself – in order to locate the Progenitors' technology and secure it for the Federation. Meanwhile, Book puts himself in harm's way to help Burnham survive and Rayner leads the U.S.S. Discovery in an epic winner-takes-all battle against Breen forces.

name: Star Trek: Discovery
overview: Follow the voyages of Starfleet on their missions to discover new worlds and new life forms, and one Starfleet officer who must learn that to truly understand all things alien, you must first understand yourself.

episodes.name: "Will You Take My Hand?" Bonus Scene
episodes.overview: Mirror Georgiou receives a surprise invitation from Leland to join a mysterious organization.

episodes.name: Discovering Discovery: The Concepts and Casting of Star Trek: Discovery
episodes.overview: Interviews with producers, writers and stars of Star Trek: Discovery about casting of the debut season.

episodes.name: Standing In The Shadow of Giants: Creating The Sound of Discovery
episodes.overview: A discussion with executive producer Alex Kurtzman and composer Jeff Russo about creating the Discovery theme and score for the show.

episodes.name: Creature Comforts
episodes.overview: A behind-the-scenes look at the makeup and prosthetics department on Star Trek: Discovery, as they both modernize well-known Star Trek species like the Klingons, Vulcans and the Andorians, and bring to life a new species, the Kelpiens.

episodes.name: Star Trek Discovery: The Voyage of Season 1
episodes.overview: The cast, writers and producers comment on the overall Klingon War arc and many individual episodes.

episodes.name: Dress for Success: Season 1
episodes.overview: Gersha Phillips talks about creating the uniform for the show. The cast and other member of the costume department comment on the costumes (including the Klingon costumes).

episodes.name: A Woman's Journey
episodes.overview: The producers and cast speak to the characterization of the show being about the life journey of Michael Burnham, a woman.

episodes.name: Feeding Frenzy
episodes.overview: The crew talk about the work to make food that can be use for the various scenes where the cast is eating.

episodes.name: Prop Me Up: Season 1
episodes.overview: All about creating the phaser, the tricorder and the communicator. There is also discussion about the weapons used by the Klingons and all the props used in the Mirror Universe.

episodes.name: Creating Space: Season 1
episodes.overview: Creating the CG characters and scenes for the show. Many different shots showing designers, animatics and the final product. Alex Kurtzman comments on how this work has to match the best seen in contemporary  movies. Many shots about green screen work done on Stage 16 at Paramount Studios for the pilot episode.

episodes.name: Designing Discovery: Season 1
episodes.overview: Todd Cherniawsky discusses the challenge of keeping canon, yet doing something new and fresh in creating the ships for use in the show. He says that the designs were influenced by large navel vessels (e.g. submarines and surface ships). Taking over for Todd  Cherniawsky, Tamara Deverell did production design for the second half of season one and talks about designing the Orion Embassy/Encampment on the Klingon home world.

episodes.name: Designing Discovery: Season 2
episodes.overview: On a show where no location exists in our world, the production and lighting design teams must create every space. Look at the locations and spaces created for Season Two.

episodes.name: Prop Me Up: Season 2
episodes.overview: Propmaster Mario Moreira takes fans through the world of Discovery props.

episodes.name: Dress for Success: Season 2
episodes.overview: Each species has its own fashion style dictated by both culture and physical attributes. Gersha Phillips and her team discuss how costumes inform a character and how they create a spectacular array of clothing, uniforms and armor for every kind of species.

episodes.name: Creature Comforts: Season 2
episodes.overview: Producers, craftsmen and actors discuss the design process, the implementation and the performance required to bring characters to life.

episodes.name: Creating Space: Season 2
episodes.overview: There are some shots that simply can't be done practically when you are set in space. The VFX team, headed by Jason Zimmerman, pushes the envelope every week to create amazing computer graphics to give fans a realistic feel of space.

episodes.name: Star Trek Discovery: The Voyage of Season 2
episodes.overview: A look at the adventures and plot twists encountered in Season 2 by the crew of the Discovery.

episodes.name: Enter the Enterprise
episodes.overview: Captain Pike shepherds U.S.S. Discovery through Season Two, but must return to his original command on the U.S.S. Enterprise. The production designer, builders, actors and producers discuss the daunting task of reviving the iconic ship's bridge.

episodes.name: The Red Angel
episodes.overview: A major plot point of the season is the Red Angel. Go behind-the- scenes with producers, directors and Sonequa Martin-Green, along with the craftspeople that created it and made it come to life.

episodes.name: Easter Egg: Mary Chieffo and James MacKinnon Chat in the Make-up Trailer
episodes.overview: Fans can also catch a one-on-one discussion with makeup artist James McKinnon and L'Rell actress, Mary Chieffo.

episodes.name: Putting it Together
episodes.overview: Follow the real life Discovery crew through preparation, shooting and posting the amazing Season Two finale. A true in-depth look at the many talents that come together to bring Discovery to life.

episodes.name: Star Trek Discovery: The Voyage of Season 3
episodes.overview: Jump to the future with the crew of the Discovery as they discuss the new adventures with writers and producers, and dive into how their visions were realized by the cast, sets, costumes and props.

episodes.name: Stunted
episodes.overview: Featuring interviews with cast and stunt coordinator Christopher McGuire, fans get a behind-the-scenes look at the creation of the stunts from rehearsal to the expertise required to make them safe, believable and executed to perfection.

episodes.name: Being Michael Burnham
episodes.overview: Sonequa Martin-Green takes fans on her season-long journey as Michael Burnham with her personal record of the season and this beloved character.

episodes.name: Kenneth Mitchell: To Boldly Go
episodes.overview: Traditionally the man behind the mask in Discovery, Kenneth Mitchell is unveiled as Aurellio in the third season. Featuring cast and crew interviews, this emotional and intimate look touches on Kenneth's life with ALS. Discussed on camera for the first time, the featurette highlights how Kenneth's wheelchair was included for his on-screen character, his own take on the various roles he played in Discovery and what those roles mean to the show.

episodes.name: Bridge Building
episodes.overview: Fans have been intrigued by Starship Discovery's Bridge Crew for three seasons. Now, they can immerse themselves in all things crew-related in this behind-the-scenes look showcasing the characters and actors who bring them to life each week.

episodes.name: Writer's Log: Michelle Paradise
episodes.overview: Showrunner Michelle Paradise provides a personal log about shooting the beginning of season three in Iceland.

episodes.name: Easter Egg: 15 Claps
episodes.overview: A quick two-minute bonus that shows the new season 3 on-set tradition of doing 15 claps to get the team amped up started with two of the camera crew; camera dolly grip James Parsons introduces the segment.

episodes.name: The Toll It Took
episodes.overview: The stress and difficulties and challenges of shooting a major TV production during the pandemic.

episodes.name: Creating Space: Season 4
episodes.overview: A comprehensive look at sets, production design, and production value with an emphasis on pushing the boundaries of new technologies to facilitate the show creation process.

episodes.name: Star Trek Discovery: The Voyage of Season 4
episodes.overview: A comprehensive look at story, arc, character evolutions and journeys, and more.

episodes.name: Being Michael Burnham: The Captain's Log
episodes.overview: Cast and crew reflect on the show's lead role and the part's demands on the screen and on the set. It also looks at Martin-Green's performance.

episodes.name: A Team Effort
episodes.overview: Focuses on the production departments that make Discovery come to life. Co-showrunner Michele Paradise talks about the pressure of making a high quality show and how it comes down to teamwork to pull off a show.

episodes.name: Discovery's Creative Force
episodes.overview: A tribute to Olatunde Osunsanmi. Known to most as 'Tunde, he's been a driving force on set in Toronto as the on-site executive producer and in-house director for Discovery. He's by all accounts a very nice guy, and he really took the role of being the "producer on the ground" for all 5 seasons with a lot of heart and dedication to the production.

episodes.name: Being Michael Burnham
episodes.overview: Sonequa Martin-Green takes fans through her personal journey as Captain Michael Burnham. This entry is particularly bittersweet since season 5 was the last season, and includes reflection on her entire time on Discovery plus a visit behind the scenes of filming the epilogue, where Sonequa Martin-Green and David Ajala in old age makeup meet Sawandi Wilson, the actor who will be playing their adult son, for the first time in the makeup trailer.

episodes.name: Character Development
episodes.overview: The cast and showrunners discuss the characters' growth over all 5 seasons.

episodes.name: Star Trek Discovery: The Voyage of Season 5
episodes.overview: Writers, producers, directors, and cast are interviewed about the making of the 10 episodes as well and the epilogue, once they found out the fifth season would be the last.

episodes.name: The Vulcan Hello
episodes.overview: While patrolling Federation space, the U.S.S. Shenzhou encounters an object of unknown origin, putting First Officer Michael Burnham to her greatest test yet.

episodes.name: Battle at the Binary Stars
episodes.overview: Face to face with Klingon vessels, the U.S.S. Shenzhou prepares for the possibility of war if negotiations fail. Amidst the turmoil, Burnham looks back to her Vulcan upbringing for guidance.

episodes.name: Context Is for Kings
episodes.overview: Burnham finds herself aboard the U.S.S. Discovery where she quickly realizes things are not as they seem, including the mysterious Captain Gabriel Lorca.

episodes.name: The Butcher's Knife Cares Not for the Lamb's Cry
episodes.overview: With tensions and stakes high as Starfleet continues in their efforts to end the war with Klingons, Burnham begins to settle in to her new position aboard the U.S.S. Discovery.

episodes.name: Choose Your Pain
episodes.overview: Lorca unexpectedly finds himself in the company of a prisoner of war, Starfleet Lieutenant Ash Tyler, and a notorious intergalactic criminal, Harry Mudd. Meanwhile, Burnham voices her concerns about the repercussions of the spore drive jumps on “Ripper.”

episodes.name: Lethe
episodes.overview: The U.S.S. Discovery crew is intrigued by new addition, Lt. Ash Tyler. Sarek seeks Burnham's help, rekindling memories from her past. Admiral Cornwell questions Lorca's tactics.

episodes.name: Magic to Make the Sanest Man Go Mad
episodes.overview: As the U.S.S. Discovery crew attempts to let loose at a party, an unwelcome visitor comes aboard bringing about a problematic and twisted sequence of events.

episodes.name: Si Vis Pacem, Para Bellum
episodes.overview: The U.S.S. Discovery is tasked with a high priority mission to planet Pahvo and learn the science behind the Klingon's cloaking technology.

episodes.name: Into the Forest I Go
episodes.overview: Bypassing Starfleet's orders, Lorca uses the U.S.S. Discovery crew's ultimate asset, the ship itself, in an effort to end the war with the Klingons once and for all.

episodes.name: Despite Yourself
episodes.overview: While in unfamiliar territory, the U.S.S. Discovery crew is forced to get creative in their next efforts to survive opposing and unprecedented forces and return home.

episodes.name: The Wolf Inside
episodes.overview: The crew continues their guise, and Burnham is ordered on a merciless mission to end the resistance in hopes of returning home. Meanwhile, Tilly works on restoring Stamets’ neurofunction.

episodes.name: Vaulting Ambition
episodes.overview: Burnham heads to the ISS Charon with a special "gift" for the Emperor. With the help of an unexpected source, Stamets gains clarity while trapped inside the mycelial network. Saru asks for L'Rell's help.

episodes.name: What's Past is Prologue
episodes.overview: Lorca plans to move forward with a coup against the Emperor, propelling Burnham to make a quick decision to save not only herself, but the U.S.S. Discovery.

episodes.name: The War Without, The War Within
episodes.overview: Burnham and the U.S.S. Discovery crew are faced with the harsh reality of the war during their absence. In order to move forward, Starfleet must use unconventional tactics and sources to take their next action against the Klingons.

episodes.name: Will You Take My Hand?
episodes.overview: With Georgiou at the helm of the plan to end the Klingon war once and for all, the U.S.S. Discovery crew struggles to fathom and tolerate her hostile tactics. Memories of past hardships are rekindled within Burnham.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: After a century of silence, war erupts between the Federation and Klingon Empire, with a disgraced Starfleet officer at the center of the conflict.

episodes.name: Brother
episodes.overview: After answering a distress signal from the U.S.S. Enterprise, the U.S.S. Discovery welcomes aboard Captain Christopher Pike and begins a new mission to investigate the meaning behind seven mysterious red signals. Michael Burnham grapples with her past growing up on Vulcan with her foster parents and brother Spock.

episodes.name: New Eden
episodes.overview: A new signal appears, prompting Stamets' emotional return to the mycelial network and leading Burnham, Pike and Owosekun to a pre-warp planet, where they face a complex ethical dilemma. Tilly's overeagerness lands her in trouble but when the planet - and Discovery's landing party - are threatened, her curiosity may be the one thing that can save them.

episodes.name: Point of Light
episodes.overview: A surprise visitor to the U.S.S. Discovery brings shocking news about Spock and dredges up past regrets for Burnham. Following the asteroid incident, Tilly struggles to keep a grip on her reality. L'Rell's authority on Qo'noS is threatened.

episodes.name: An Obol for Charon
episodes.overview: A mysterious sphere threatens the U.S.S. Discovery even as May, in her original form, implements a plan that puts Tilly's life in danger. Saru and Burnham's bond grows when Saru is forced to acknowledge a deeply unsettling Kelpien truth. Pike receives new intel on Spock from a loyal friend.

episodes.name: Saints of Imperfection
episodes.overview: Burnham and the crew navigate a dangerous alien landscape in a race against time to save Tilly's life, but Stamets is not at all prepared for what they find in the process. Section 31 is assigned to help track down Spock, much to Pike's dismay.

episodes.name: The Sound of Thunder
episodes.overview: When a new signal appears over Saru's home planet, Burnham, Saru and the crew embark on a perilous mission that puts Saru in danger and raises questions about the Red Angel's intentions. Hugh struggles to come to terms with his new reality.

episodes.name: Light and Shadows
episodes.overview: Burnham goes to Vulcan in search of Spock, where she unearths surprising family secrets. In researching what is left of the Red Angel's signal over Kaminar, Pike and Tyler end up in battle with time itself. Georgiou has a few tricks up her sleeve for Leland and Section 31.

episodes.name: If Memory Serves
episodes.overview: Spock and Burnham head to Talos IV, where the process of healing Spock forces the siblings to confront their troubled past. Stamets desperately tries to reconnect with Hugh, while Tyler struggles to shed the crew's suspicions of him due to his past as Voq.

episodes.name: Project Daedalus
episodes.overview: When the Discovery crew infiltrates Section 31's headquarters, suspicions arise that the crew may have a traitor in their midst. Burnham tries to help Spock but her efforts don't go as planned.

episodes.name: The Red Angel
episodes.overview: Burnham is stunned when she learns her ties to Section 31 run deeper than she ever fathomed. Armed with the identity of the Red Angel, the U.S.S. Discovery goes to work on its most critical mission to date.

episodes.name: Perpetual Infinity
episodes.overview: Burnham receives the reunion she's been longing for, but it doesn't go quite as she imagined. Georgiou and Tyler sense a disturbing change in Leland.

episodes.name: Through the Valley of Shadows
episodes.overview: A fourth signal leads the U.S.S. Discovery to a world where Pike is forced to make a life-changing choice. Burnham and Spock investigate a Section 31 ship gone rogue, leading to a discovery with catastrophic consequences.

guest_stars.character: Me Hani Ika Hali Ka Po
guest_stars.name: Yadira Guevara-Prip

episodes.name: Such Sweet Sorrow (1)
episodes.overview: When the U.S.S. Discovery's crucial mission does not go according to plan, Burnham realizes what must ultimately be done. The crew prepares for the battle of a lifetime as Leland's Control ships get closer.

guest_stars.character: Me Hani Ika Hali Ka Po
guest_stars.name: Yadira Guevara-Prip

episodes.name: Such Sweet Sorrow (2)
episodes.overview: The U.S.S. Discovery battles against Control in a fight not only for their lives but for the future, with a little help from some unexpected friends. Spock and Burnham discern vital new connections between the red signals while Burnham faces one of life’s harshest truths: the right decisions are often the hardest to make.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: After answering a distress signal from the U.S.S. Enterprise, season two finds the crew of the U.S.S. Discovery joining forces with Captain Christopher Pike on a new mission to investigate seven mysterious red signals and the appearance of an unknown being called the Red Angel. While the crew must work together to unravel their meaning and origin, Michael Burnham is forced to face her past with the return of her estranged brother, Spock.

episodes.name: That Hope Is You (1)
episodes.overview: Arriving 930 years in the future, Burnham navigates a galaxy she no longer recognizes while searching for the rest of the U.S.S. Discovery crew.

episodes.name: Far from Home
episodes.overview: The crew of the Discovery races to repair their ship after they crash. Tilly & Saru make a first contact looking for Burnham.

episodes.name: People of Earth
episodes.overview: Reunited with Burnham, Discovery heads to Earth to find out what has happened to the Federation in the last thousand years.

episodes.name: Forget Me Not
episodes.overview: Burnham and Adira visit the Trill homeworld while Saru's efforts on the Discovery to help the crew reconnect yield surprises.

episodes.name: Die Trying
episodes.overview: After reuniting with what remains of Starfleet and the Federation, the U.S.S. Discovery and its crew must prove that a 930 year old crew and starship are exactly what this new future needs.

episodes.name: Scavengers
episodes.overview: After receiving a message from Book, Burnham and Georgiou embark on a rogue mission to find him, leaving Saru to pick up the pieces with Admiral Vance. Meanwhile, Stamets forms an unexpected bond with Adira.

episodes.name: Unification III
episodes.overview: While grappling with the fallout of her recent actions, and what her future might hold, Burnham agrees to represent the Federation in an intense debate about the release of politically sensitive - but highly valuable - Burn data.

episodes.name: The Sanctuary
episodes.overview: Osyraa attacks Book's home planet and the Discovery travels there to help. Stamets and Adira investigate The Burn.

episodes.name: Terra Firma (1)
episodes.overview: The U.S.S. Discovery crew journey to a mysterious planet in hopes of finding a cure for Georgiou's deteriorating condition. Stamets and Adira make a stunning breakthrough with the newly acquired Burn data.

episodes.name: Terra Firma (2)
episodes.overview: Georgiou uncovers the true depths of the plot against her, leading her to a revelation about how deeply her time on the U.S.S. Discovery truly changed her.

episodes.name: Su'Kal
episodes.overview: Discovery ventures to the Verubin Nebula, where Burnham, Saru, and Culber make a shocking realization about the origin of the Burn. The rest of the crew faces an unexpected threat.

episodes.name: There is a Tide…
episodes.overview: After capturing the U.S.S. Discovery, Osyraa seeks a meeting with Admiral Vance while Burnham and the crew must overcome unimaginable odds as they attempt to regain command of their ship.

episodes.name: That Hope Is You (2)
episodes.overview: As the Emerald Chain tightens its grip and the mystery of the Burn is finally solved, Burnham and the crew have one last chance to save themselves - and the Federation.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: After making the jump in the second season finale, season three finds the U.S.S. Discovery crew dropping out of the wormhole and into an unknown future far from the home they once knew. Now living in a time filled with uncertainty, the U.S.S. Discovery crew, along with the help of some new friends, must together fight to regain a hopeful future.

episodes.name: Kobayashi Maru
episodes.overview: After months spent reconnecting the Federation with distant worlds, Captain Michael Burnham and the crew of the U.S.S. Discovery are sent to assist a damaged space station – a seemingly routine mission that reveals the existence of a terrifying new threat.

episodes.name: Anomaly
episodes.overview: Saru returns to help the U.S.S. Discovery uncover the mystery of an unusually destructive new force. As Burnham leads the crew, she must also find a way to help Book cope with an unimaginable loss.

episodes.name: Choose to Live
episodes.overview: Burnham and Tilly hunt the killer of a Starfleet officer as Stamets and the science team race against the clock to prevent the anomaly from killing anyone else.

episodes.name: All Is Possible
episodes.overview: Tilly and Adira lead a team of Starfleet Academy cadets on a training mission that takes a dangerous turn. Meanwhile, Burnham is pulled into tense negotiations on Ni’Var.

episodes.name: The Examples
episodes.overview: Burnham and Book race to evacuate a group of stranded colonists in the anomaly’s path as one of the Federation’s brightest scientists comes aboard the U.S.S. Discovery to do high-stakes research with Saru and Stamets.

episodes.name: Stormy Weather
episodes.overview: Seeking answers, the U.S.S. Discovery ventures into a subspace rift created by the Dark Matter Anomaly. Meanwhile, Book faces a strange visitor from his past.

episodes.name: ...But to Connect
episodes.overview: Tensions rise as representatives from across the galaxy gather to confront the threat of the Dark Matter Anomaly. Zora's new sentience raises difficult questions.

episodes.name: All In
episodes.overview: Following a hunch, Captain Burnham tracks Book to an old haunt from their courier days and gets drawn into a high-stakes competition for a powerful weapon.

episodes.name: Rubicon
episodes.overview: Captain Burnham and the U.S.S. Discovery race to stop Book and Ruon Tarka from launching a rogue plan that could inadvertently endanger the galaxy.

episodes.name: The Galactic Barrier
episodes.overview: Captain Burnham and her crew must go where few have gone before: beyond the Galactic Barrier. Meanwhile, Book learns the truth of what drives Ruon Tarka.

episodes.name: Rosetta
episodes.overview: While Captain Burnham leads an away mission to a planet that was once home to the aliens responsible for the DMA, Book and Tarka secretly infiltrate the U.S.S. Discovery.

episodes.name: Species Ten-C
episodes.overview: As the DMA approaches Earth and Ni’Var, Captain Burnham and the crew of the U.S.S. Discovery attempt to make First Contact with the powerful species responsible before it’s too late.

episodes.name: Coming Home
episodes.overview: The DMA approaches Earth and Ni’Var. With evacuations underway, Burnham and the team aboard the U.S.S. Discovery must find a way to communicate and connect with a species far different from their own before time runs out.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: After season three finds the U.S.S. Discovery crew in an unknown future far from the home they once knew, the space explorers encounter an unpredictable gravitational anomaly that could bring their journey to an end. Now living in a time filled with uncertainty, the Discovery crew, along with the help of some new friends, must work together to restore hope to the Federation.

episodes.name: Red Directive
episodes.overview: Captain Burnham and the U.S.S. Discovery are sent to retrieve a mysterious 800-year-old Romulan vessel; until the artifact hidden inside is stolen, leading to an epic chase. Meanwhile, Saru is offered the position of a lifetime, and Tilly's efforts to help pull her into a tangled web of secrecy.

episodes.name: Under the Twin Moons
episodes.overview: On Saru's last mission as Captain Burnham's Number One, the team ventures to a seemingly abandoned planet to hunt for what might be the greatest treasure in the galaxy.

episodes.name: Jinaal
episodes.overview: On Trill, Captain Burnham, Book, and Culber must pass a dangerous test to prove themselves worthy of the next clue. Adira reconnects with Gray and Saru’s first day as ambassador is complicated by his engagement to T'Rina.

episodes.name: Face the Strange
episodes.overview: On the way to the next clue, the U.S.S. Discovery is sabotaged by a mysterious weapon, leaving Captain Burnham, Rayner, and Stamets as the only crew members who can possibly save the ship in time.

episodes.name: Mirrors
episodes.overview: Captain Burnham and Book journey into extradimensional space in search of the next clue to the location of the Progenitors' power. Meanwhile, Rayner navigates his first mission in command of the U.S.S. Discovery, and Culber opens up to Tilly.

episodes.name: Whistlespeak
episodes.overview: While undercover in a pre-warp society, Captain Burnham is forced to consider breaking the Prime Directive when a local tradition threatens Tilly's life. Meanwhile, Culber tries to connect with Stamets, and Adira steps up when Rayner assigns them a position on the bridge.

episodes.name: Erigah
episodes.overview: With Moll and L'ak finally in custody, the Federation is pulled into a diplomatic and ethical firestorm when the Breen arrive and demand they be handed over. Meanwhile, a frustrated Book looks for ways to help as Tilly, Adira, and Reno work to decipher the latest clue.

episodes.name: Labyrinths
episodes.overview: When Captain Burnham is trapped within a “mindscape” designed to test her worthiness to retrieve the Progenitor's powerful technology, Book, Rayner, and the crew of the U.S.S. Discovery must hold off the Breen long enough for her to escape.

episodes.name: Lagrange Point
episodes.overview: After Moll and the Breen capture a mysterious structure that contains the Progenitors' power, Captain Burnham must lead a covert mission to retrieve it before the Breen figure out how to use it.

episodes.name: Life, Itself
episodes.overview: Trapped inside a mysterious alien portal that defies familiar rules of time, space, and gravity, Captain Burnham must fight Moll – and the environment itself – in order to locate the Progenitors' technology and secure it for the Federation. Meanwhile, Book puts himself in harm's way to help Burnham survive and Rayner leads the U.S.S. Discovery in an epic winner-takes-all battle against Breen forces.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: The fifth and final season finds Captain Burnham and the crew of the U.S.S. Discovery uncovering a mystery that will send them on an epic adventure across the galaxy to find an ancient power whose very existence has been deliberately hidden for centuries. But there are others on the hunt as well ... dangerous foes who are desperate to claim the prize for themselves and will stop at nothing to get it.

tagline: At the edge of the universe, discovery begins.
